StringTable.Label: APMission1_AltarianIndustrialSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes manufacturing and research buildings cheaper.

StringTable.Label: APMission1_AltarianXeonMysticism_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Social Matrix.

StringTable.Label: APMission1_AltarianDarkEnergeyReseach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Dark Energy Lab.

StringTable.Label: APMission1_AltarianParadiseWorlds_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate terraforming plants.

StringTable.Label: APMission1_AltarianInherentMagic_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases accuracy and interferes with enemy targeting.

StringTable.Label: APMission1_AltarianWeaponsSpecializationTech2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: APMission1_AltarianWeaponsSpecializationTech3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: APMission1_AltarianDefensiveMeditation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Champion's Temple.

StringTable.Label: APMission1_AltarianStarFederationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of the Star Federation form of government.

StringTable.Label: APMission1_AltarianTradeFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases overall value of trade routes

StringTable.Label: APMission1_AltarianMeditationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of Meditation Centers.

StringTable.Label: APMission1_AltarianPlanetaryRefection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of Communion Centers.

StringTable.Label: APMission1_AltarianSerenityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of the Drathian Temple.

StringTable.Label: APMission1_AltarianPrecursorAntiquities_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of the Precursor Reliquary.
